#summary how to install Chassis

Assuming your web server is deployed at www.example.com, and your servlet container is deployed at servlet.example.com:8080.

[http://code.google.com/p/dsn-chassis/downloads/list Download] the latest release of the Chassis Generic GWT Client, and the Chassis Generic User Service, to the machine hosting your servlet container. E.g. ...

{{{
$ wget http://dsn-chassis.googlecode.com/files/chassis-generic-client-gwt-0.1-alpha-1.war
$ wget http://dsn-chassis.googlecode.com/files/chassis-generic-service-user-0.1-alpha-1.war
}}}

Copy these war files to the Tomcat webapps folder. E.g. ...

{{{
$ sudo cp chassis-generic-client-gwt-0.1-alpha-1.war /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/
$ sudo cp chassis-generic-service-user-0.1-alpha-1.war /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/
}}}

Add proxy directives to the Apache configuration on your web server. E.g. ...

{{{
ProxyPass         /chassis/client  http://servlet.example.com:8080/chassis-generic-client-gwt-0.1-alpha-1
ProxyPassReverse  /chassis/client  http://servlet.example.com:8080/chassis-generic-client-gwt-0.1-alpha-1

ProxyPass         /chassis/service/user  http://servlet.example.com:8080/chassis-generic-service-user-0.1-alpha-1
ProxyPassReverse  /chassis/service/user  http://servlet.example.com:8080/chassis-generic-service-user-0.1-alpha-1
}}}

Restart Apache on your web server.
Edit the Chassis Generic Client configuration file to point to the correct User Service location. E.g. do ...

{{{
$ sudo emacs /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/chassis-generic-client-gwt-0.1-alpha-1/spike/configuration.js 
}}}

... and edit to ...

{{{
CHASSIS = new Object();
CHASSIS.userDetailsServiceEndpointURL = "/chassis/service/user/gwtrpc/userdetails";
}}}

In each unpacked war file, place a customised spring config file in the /WEB-INF/. E.g. do...

{{{
$ sudo cp /custom/config/security.xml /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/chassis-generic-client-gwt-0.1-alpha-1/WEB-INF/security.xml 
}}}

Now, visit http://www.example.com/chassis/client/spike/ to check it is working.
